name: Chroma Rails
description:
As an interplanetary cadet it's your job to stay on the rails. It's no easy job (even though you only have ONE button to press!). Many have gone before you, and many will come after...You'll have to stay alert if you're to survive.

-- Hit 'X' on keyboard (or any controller button) multiple times to change your colour to match the rails.

Add me on Twitter for updates on a new version for mobile and other stuff: @JASONSUMM
